text: avar bhumiyilute sancarikkunnille? annane avarkkumumpullavarute antyam evvidhamayirunnuvenn neakkikkanunnille? avar ivarekkalere karuttarayirunnu. avar bhumiye nannayi kilaccumariccirunnu. ivaratine vasayeagyamakkiyatinekkal parkkan parrunnatakkukayum ceytirunnu. avarkkulla dutanmar vyaktamaya telivukalumayi avare samipiccu. allahu avareat akramam kanikkukayayirunnilla. maricc avar tannaleatutanne atikramam kattukayayirunnu
